Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections

Class DelegatingSCPConnection

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.UDPConnection<SDPMessage>
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.SDPConnection
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.SCPConnection
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.connections.DelegatingSCPConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, Connection, SCPSenderReceiver
public class DelegatingSCPConnection extends SCPConnection
An SCP connection that actually delegates message sending and receiving to another connection. Note that closing a delegating connection does nothing; the socket is only closed when the real underlying connection is closed.
Author:
Donal Fellows

    • doReceive

      protected ByteBuffer doReceive(int timeout) throws SocketTimeoutException, IOException, InterruptedException
      Description copied from class: UDPConnection
      Receive data from the connection.

      This operation is delegatable; see DelegatingSCPConnection.

      Overrides:
      doReceive in class UDPConnection<SDPMessage>
      Parameters:
      timeout - The timeout in milliseconds
      Returns:
      The data received, in a little-endian buffer
      Throws:
      SocketTimeoutException - If a timeout occurs before any data is received
      IOException - If an error occurs receiving the data
      InterruptedException - If communications are interrupted.

      Description copied from interface: Connection
      Determines if the medium is connected at this point in time. Connected media are not closed. Disconnected media might not be open.
